body:
This form is for use by managers in the Digital & Technology team to help us plan our workforce and recruit essential staff. You will also need to complete the [leavers checklist for managers](https://intranet.justice.gov.uk/guidance/hr/end-change-of-employment/). 

## Before you begin

You will need: 

* the team member's leaving date
* their business unit
* their place of work
* a list of technologies they use

It is your responsibility to ensure your team member's equipment, such as laptop, mobile phone and security pass, are collected when they leave.
heading: MoJ Leavers form
lede: Use this form to let us know one of your team is leaving.
